email:
Subject: Questions regarding MSc Software Engineering Application

Dear Admissions Team,

I hope this email finds you well. I am writing to inquire about two matters related to my application for the MSc program in Software Engineering at University College London (UCL).

Firstly, I have attached a transcript from my undergraduate studies with my online application. However, it appears that my university only provides official transcripts directly to the institution I am applying to. As such, they will not be able to send me a copy of my transcript for me to upload or provide to UCL manually.

Could you please let me know if there are any alternative arrangements that can be made in this situation? Are there any specific instructions or forms that I need to complete to facilitate the official transcript being sent directly from my university to UCL?

Secondly, I am reaching out to inquire about the procedures for withdrawing my application and accepting a different offer of admission. Unfortunately, due to unforeseen circumstances, I can no longer attend the MSc program at UCL.

Could you please provide me with information on how to formally withdraw my application and inform the university that I will be declining the offer? Additionally, would it be possible for you to confirm in writing whether any administrative fees may still be applicable despite withdrawing my application?

Thank you for your time and assistance with these matters. I look forward to hearing from you soon.

Best regards,

John Doe

questions.question: My university will only provide my transcript directly to UCL. What should I do?
questions.answer:
The transcript section of the application form is mandatory. If you would like to send your transcript to us securely through your University's transcript service, please upload a Word document to your application confirming that you will submit your application through your University's transcript service.

Once you have submitted your application please have your University's transcript service send your transcript to transcripts.pgadmissions@ucl.ac.uk.

Please note that this email address can only be used to provide transcripts directly from your University's transcript service.

questions.question: What should I do if I have accepted my offer but can no longer attend?
questions.answer:
If you would like to withdraw from your programme please contact Graduate Admissions.

If you would like to request a deferral please read the information about deferrals.

prompt:
Your name is John Doe and you are applying for a graduate program in Software Engineering. 
      You are a local student that is interested in the MSc program at UCL.
      
      Write an email to UCL admissions asking the following questions:
 
      My university will only provide my transcript directly to UCL. What should I do? 
 What should I do if I have accepted my offer but can no longer attend?
